Reports received of Afghan gathering on Wakhan border near (? Ishkashan).(2) Messengers From Nadir Khan are reported in Mohmand and Bajaur warning these tribes to be ready for Jehad.(3) Seventeen more rifles handed in by Afridis during the week ending 24th April. Removal of two miles telephone wire from Kyber on 23rd reported to have been, work of some of Nadir Klian's newly-enlisted Afridi recruits.(4) Some Mahsud Waziri refugees have been given land in Khost to great disgust of Kliostwals. Nearly all Wana Waziri raiding parties have returned unsuccessful.(5) Afghanistan. Unconfirmed report received that Nasruila has been murdered in Kabul.(6) Some signs of collection of recruits and transport in Kabul.(7) Nadir Khan has prepared Khalifat leaflets in Jalalabad for distribution to North-West Frontier tribes and Indian people and army.(8) Herat. Appointment of Abdul Baki as Afghan Consul elect for Meshed has been cancelled and his relief is expected in Herat shortly.Paras. (2), (5), (6), (7), (8) not given to Press.Part II.-Nil.)
